name: BOBBY (SoDeep)
description: This is a short point-and-click adventure highlighting some points of the life of  my favorite rapper, Logic. The events depicted in this game are not fully accurate, but give a very general sense of some things he went through to become the person he is today. I made this game with Caleb Obeng (ryterex.itch.io) for the final project of my Game Design I class.  On this project, I created the art and dialogue, and Caleb added all of the technical aspects. I couldn't have done it without him.
